Translations.Text: Glorify the Name of thy Lord, The Lofty
Who created and shaped
and who ordained and, then, guided
and who brought out the pasture
then, made it dark colored refuse
We will make thee recite and thou wilt not forget
but what God willed. Truly, He knows the openly published and whatever is hidden
And We will make easy for thee an easing
So remind if a reminder profited them
Whoever dreads God will recollect
but the disappointed will scorn itâ€”
even he who will roast in the great fire
again, neither dying in it nor living
He, surely, prospered, he who purified himself
and remembered the Name of his Lord and invoked blessings
Nay! You hold this present life in greater favor
yet the world to come is better, and one that endures
Truly, this is in the previous scrolls
the scrolls of Abraham and Moses
Approached thee the discourse of the Overwhelming Event
Faces on that Day will be ones that are humbled
ones that work and ones that are fatigued
roasting in a hot fire
They will be given to drink from boiling receptacles
Is it not that there is no food for them but a thorny fruit
It will not fatten nor will it avail hunger
Faces on that Day will be ones that are pleasant
ones who are well-pleased by their endeavoring
in a magnificent Garden
They will hear no babble in it
In it is a running spring
In it are exalted couches
and goblets that are set down
and cushions arrayed
and rugs, ones that are dispersed
Will they not, then, look on the camel, how it was created
And of the heaven, how it was lifted up
And the mountains, how they were hoisted up
And the earth, how it was stretched out
Then, remind for thou art only one who reminds
Thou art not over them one who is a register of their deeds
But whoever turned away and is one who is ungrateful
God will punish him with the greater punishment
Truly, to Us is their reversion
Again, truly, on Us is their reckoning
By the dawn
and the ten nights
by the even number and the odd number
and at night when it sets out
Is there not in that an oath to be sworn for a possessor of intelligence
Hast thou not considered how thy Lord accomplished with Ad
with Iram of the pillars
of which are not created the likes in the land
And with Thamud, those who hollowed out the rocks in the valley
And with Pharaoh, the possessor of the stakes
those who were defiant in the land
and made much corruption in it
So thy Lord unloosed on them a scourge of punishment
Truly, thy Lord is, surely, on the watch
Then, as for the human being, when his Lord tested him and honored him and lauded him, he says: My Lord honored me
But whenever He tested him and constricted his provision for him, he says: My Lord despised me
No indeed! Nay! You honor not the orphan
and you encouraged not one another about food for the needy
and you consume the inheritance, a greedy consuming
and you love wealth with an ardent cherishing
No indeed! When the earth will be ground to powder, ground to powder, ground to powder
and thy Lord will draw near, and the angels, ranged in rows
on the Day hell is brought about. On that Day the human being will recollect. And how will the reminder be for him
He will say: O would that I had put forward from this life for the world to come
Then, on that Day, He will punish no one the like of His punishment
And no one will bind as His restraints
O soul, one that is at peace
Return to thy Lord, one that is well-pleasing, well-pleased
Enter thou among My servants
and thou enter My Garden
